name: ISLANDS MIGHT FLY
description:
ISLANDS MIGHT FLY is a tycoon game about managing interplanetary station rotating somewhere in space. Accommodate customers from all around the world. Create historical reenactments for the richest people of the future. You will build the infrastructure of the station, create scenarios for it's inhabitants and manage the recources.

In the future the richest people of the world will pay to experience different eras: from Ancient Rome to Sengoku period of Japan. You are assigned to create these scenarios in a giant rotating space habitat. Hire engineers and artists to fulfill dreams of the future to relive the past.

  • Manage engineers and creatives
  • Create projects and fulfill different scenarios
  • Build and improve infrastructure
  • Unique mechanics of managing logistics inside rotating space station
